resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82208</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82208</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>8846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Around the World</string>
            <string language="es">Por el mundo</string>
            <string language="ga">Timpeall an Domhain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Um die Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Autour du monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em torno do mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Intorno al mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε όλο τον κόσμο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will answer questions on countries based on culture, food, location, features and cities.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos responderán preguntas sobre países relacionadas con la cultura, la gastronomía, la ubicación, sus características y sus ciudades.</string>
            <string language="ga">Freagróidh daltaí ceisteanna faoi thíortha bunaithe ar chultúr, bia, suíomh, gnéithe agus cathracha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen beantworten Fragen über die Länder, 
die auf Kultur, Nahrung, Standort, Merkmalen und Städte basieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles répondront à des questions sur des
pays basés sur la culture, la nourriture, l'emplacement, les 
dispositifs et les villes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas responderão a perguntas nos países 
baseados na cultura, no alimento, na posição, nas características e
nas cidades.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille risponderanno alle domande sui paesi 
basati su coltura, su alimento, su posizione, sulle caratteristiche e 
sulle città.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα απαντήσουν στις ερωτήσεις στις χώρες 
βασισμένες στον πολιτισμό, τα τρόφιμα, τη θέση, τα χαρακτηριστικά
γνωρίσματα και τις πόλεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>8846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">7-9</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>assessment</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Scoilnet;
FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>540</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>82208</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.scoilnet.ie/Quiz.aspx?id=967</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
